attributes.action: create immediate legislation to compel the bonus pools of all UK-based Financial Institutions to be donated to the UN in order to assist in the reconstruction of Haiti
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should also press for all other rich countries to do the same. This is to ensure that the financial institutions make a visible reparation for the disaster that they have brought upon the World's financial system. If any Financial Institution refuses to declare a bonus pool amount, an independent team should assess the estimated bonus-pool amount and this should be deducted from the institutions declared profits.
